children.text: int main ( ) { int t = 0 , n = 0 , i = 0 , j = 0 , k = 0 , max1 = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < t ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n ; i > 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { if ( A [ i ] [ j ] >= A [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) { A [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = A [ i ] [ j ] + A [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else { A [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = A [ i ] [ j + 1 ] + A [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } } } printf ( "\n%d" , A [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] [ j ] ) ; }
